titleStmt.title: How to do good to many, or, The publick good is the Christians life directions and motives to it, intended for an auditory of London citizens, and published for them, for want of leave to preach them / by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
